# O-list-analysis

This dataset was obtained from [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1re0HnJD5TCNVkVDHoPQ08aByKMWRRRJC). I solved business questions using postgresql. 
# Question 1 :What is the total revenue generated by Olist, and how has it changed over time?
![Solution 1](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%201.png)

# Question 2 :How many orders were placed on Olist, and how does this vary by month or season?
![Solution 2](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%202.png)

# Question 3 :What are the most popular product categories on Olist, and how do their sales volumes compare to each other?
![Solution 3](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%203.png)

# Question 4 :What is the average order value (AOV) on Olist, and how does this vary by product category?
![Solution 4](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%204.png)

# Question 5 : What is the distribution of seller ratings on Olist, and how does this impact sales performance?
![Solution 5](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%205.png)

# Question 6 : What is the average customer rating for products sold on Olist, and how does this impact sales performance?
![Solution 6](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%206.png)

# Question 7 :What are the top-selling products on Olist, and how have their sales trends changed over time
![Solution 7](https://github.com/Popsonn/O-list-analysis/blob/main/olist%20solution%207.png)

# Question 8 :: Which payment methods are most commonly used by Olist customers, and how does this vary by product category?
